com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document.textspan

Class SpenTextSpan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document.textspan.SpenTextSpan

  • public class SpenTextSpan
extends Object
    Base class of text span.
    The classes that affect character-level text formatting extend this class.

    Since:
    5.0.0

      • SPAN_INCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE

        public static final int SPAN_INCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE
        Non-0-length spans of type SPAN_INCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE expand to include text inserted at their starting point but not at their ending point.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setExpansion(int), getExpansion(), Constant Field Values

      • SPAN_INCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE

        public static final int SPAN_INCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE
        Spans of type SPAN_INCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE expand to include text inserted at either their starting or ending point.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setExpansion(int), getExpansion(), Constant Field Values

      • SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE

        public static final int SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE
        Spans of type SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE do not expand to include text inserted at either their starting or ending point.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setExpansion(int), getExpansion(), Constant Field Values

        public static final int SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE

        Since:
        5.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenTextSpan

        public SpenTextSpan(int type)
        Creates an SpenTextSpan instance with the span properties.
        Parameters:
        type - The span type. Can't create the NONE type span.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the type is negative or lager than TYPE_HYPERTEXT.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • SpenTextSpan

        public SpenTextSpan(int type,
                    int startPosition,
                    int endPosition,
                    int expansionType)
        Creates an SpenTextSpan instance with the span properties.
        Parameters:
        type - The span type. Can't create the NONE type span.
        startPosition - The start position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        endPosition - The end position of span. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        expansionType - The expansion type of span.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the endPosition is smaller than the startPosition. If the expansionType is negative or lager than the SpenTextSpan.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE. If the type is negative or lager than TYPE_HYPERTEXT.
        Since:
        5.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Return the span type.
        The default type is TYPE_NONE
        Returns:
        The span type.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        TYPE_NONE, TYPE_BOLD, TYPE_FONT_SIZE, TYPE_FOREGROUND_COLOR, TYPE_HYPERTEXT, TYPE_ITALIC, TYPE_UNDERLINE

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int startPosition,
                        int endPosition)
        Sets the start character position and end character position of Span.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - start position. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        endPosition - end position. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the startPosition is lager than endPosition.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        getStart(), getEnd()

      • getStart

        public int getStart()
        Return the beginning of the range of text to which the specified markup object is attached.
        Returns:
        The start position.
        Since:
        5.0.0

        Since:

        public void setExpansion(int type)

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        5.0.0
